summary: At the height of World War II, a tiny wood pigeon enlists in the elite Royal Homing Pigeon Service to serve Britain, as the fearsome General Von Talon (Tim Curry) and his deadly squadron of falcons patrol the English Channel. Is he a war-hero in the making?
cast: Ewan McGregor|Ricky Gervais|Tim Curry|Jim Broadbent|Hugh Laurie|John Cleese|John Hurt|Pip Torrens|Rik Mayall|Olivia Williams|Jonathan Ross|Brian Lonsdale|Dan Roberts|Michael Schlingmann|Sharon Horgan|Sean Samuels|Buckley Collum|Annette Badland|Harriet Jones|Harry Peacock|Corin Mellinger|Gary Chapman|Curtis Augspurger|Mike Harbour|Michael Jenn|Heidi Fecht|Robert Lence|Ali Dowling|Christopher Fairbank|Rupert Farley|Dan Flynn|Kristopher Milnes|Stephen Pacey|James Robinson|Emma Tate
title: Valiant
